text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A trainer with no trainees has one<n>job—getting to know new
students.
choice_data_list: (All right, I'm gonna really study the racers today!)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
When I get to the tracks, I spot Agnes<n>Digital running the dirt
course.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's small, but she's sturdy and<n>seems to have a lot of
leg strength. In<n>the blink of an eye, she blasts down<n>the
final straight and crosses the<n>finish line.
choice_data_list:
(She looks experienced... I guess she's already
debuted, then.)

(She looks experienced... I guess she's already
debuted, then.)

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Whew...

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
Agnes Digital, that was great! You<n>were in top form, as
always. At this<n>level, you're more than ready to take<n>on
the tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Hwah?! The tryouts? Already?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
But I, uh... That's kinda... Could I have<n>more time to think
about it?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: I'll, uh, I'll just scooch over to the<n>turf course...

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text: Ah! If you insist. Don't push yourself<n>too hard, though!

text_block_list.name: Instructor
text_block_list.text:
To think that she trains this hard<n>every single day... and then
turns<n>around and does it again on the other<n>track. She's
working twice as hard as<n>anyone.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As Agnes Digital sets off down the<n>turf, I'm taken aback by
how light her<n>steps are. I thought she was a dirt<n>racer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I whip out my stopwatch to check her<n>time, and my jaw
drops.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She's good on turf and dirt, butshe hasn't even run the tryouts yet,let alone debut?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My curiosity gets the better of me,<n>and I head over to ask
her directly.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Fweheehee... Running on the same<n>ground my oshis just
stepped on is<n>so magical!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
If I can just follow their cleatprints,<n>I'll be ready to follow
them down any<n>track! Mwehehe, I'll follow them to<n>the
ends of the earth...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Ah, but I've gotta be careful not to<n>stick out. I dunno what I
would've<n>done if I accidentally agreed to enter<n>the tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I mean, I'd never forgive myself if I<n>made such a rookie
mistake...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: W-WAIT! Who just said that? You?!
choice_data_list: Me. We watched Daiwa Scarlet together.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Oh, you're that trainer who was<n>simping as hard as I was.
Looks like<n>we meet again.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
So how's everything going? Lady<n>Luck rewarding your
efforts?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I've been working hard to rack up<n>good karma, y'know.
Praying to my<n>merch shrine, giving thanks for my<n>daily
doses of moe, ugly crying over<n>idols...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
B-but more importantly! You didn't,<n>uh, happen to overhear
me rambling,<n>did you?!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Ah... I see. I see how it is.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Well, the reason I'm avoiding the<n>tryouts is honestly pretty
simple. Just<n>imagine your Umamusume oshis for a<n>sec.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
They specialize in either turf or dirt,<n>right? But I don't really
have a<n>specialty, and I have favs in both.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
That's the hardest part... I can't pick<n>one without
abandoning the other. And<n>I really, reeeeeally don't want
that...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The graded races at central<n>racecourses are mostly for turf,<n>
especially at higher levels.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A lot of racers inevitably drift away<n>from dirt, so I get what
Agnes Digital<n>means.
choice_data_list: You're really passionate about racing, huh?
You're really passionate about racing, huh?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Well, of course! I love watching bothstyles! I love turf Umas and dirtUmas! I love every singleUmamusume ever to run!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Y'know, um. It ain't easy bein' a<n>fangirl, okay?! I've got
way too many<n>favs to watch just one track type!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Duh! I thought you were as down bad<n>as I am! I wanna
watch both! I have<n>to, but...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
If I run turf, I won't be able to see dirt<n>Umas up close! If I
run dirt, I won't get<n>to see turf Umas!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
Aaaaahdk, how is that even fair?! I<n>can't come up with a
solution, so I've<n>been turning down all the scouts and<n>
tryout invites to stall for time.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
I just wanna SIMP! Whether on turf<n>or dirt, I wanna absorb
the glory of<n>eeeeevery single Umamusume from<n>the
frontlines!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hmm... I can't help but feel like she's<n>seeing things as a
fan more than a<n>racer.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
But at least you get me! You feel my<n>pain, right?! 'Cause
you love<n>Umamusume too!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I attempt to calm Agnes Digital down,<n>then I take stock of
the situation.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She wants to follow her favorite<n>"oshi" Umamusume, but
debuting as a<n>racer herself will limit what kind of<n>races
she can join.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She can't pick between dirt or turf, so<n>she's been dodging
the question by<n>rejecting scout offers.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Sigh... If I had a clear specialty,it'd be so much easier to accept theinevitable...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's already spent so long thinking<n>herself in circles.
Maybe what she<n>really needs is a second opinion.
choice_data_list: How about we ask some other racers for advice?
How about we ask some other racers for advice?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: Huh? We can't just...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I peek down at the course, where I<n>spot the Overlord of turf
racing, T.M.<n>Opera O, and the idol of dirt racing,<n>Smart
Falcon.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: ...What.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text: WHAT?! That's the Overlord and the<n>Umadol!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: My, what fervent gazes. Are you<n>perhaps here to see me?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I welcome you both! I'm always<n>happy to pose for photos,
answer<n>questions, record interviews—anything<n>for my
adoring fans!
choice_data_list:
Well, we wanted to ask why you chose turf over
dirt.

Well, we wanted to ask why you chose turf over
dirt.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that's quite a unique question.<n>The answer is simple,
really. For you<n>see—I simply chose the stage best<n>suited to
complement my glory!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Oh? I know you... You're Digital!<n>Thank you for cheering me
on at my<n>last performance!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I'm so flattered to see you here at<n>the track! ♪ You must be
a really big<n>fan!
choice_data_list:
She was hoping to ask why you chose dirt
racing.

She was hoping to ask why you chose dirt
racing.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Huh? The reason I picked dirt over<n>turf? Hmm... Well... I
promised myself<n>that I'd be my best self and do what<n>
only I can! ☆

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even though their phrasing differs,<n>both answers are
essentially the<n>same. They picked a style that would<n>show
off their talents best.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Now to apply that to Agnes Digital...

text_block_list.name: Agnes Digital
text_block_list.text:
...As the grass follows the wind, so<n>too does luck follows
the virtuous.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
On that cryptic note, she passes out...<n>Did I just witness
someone swoon in<n>real life?
